description: Monitoring Dashboard for Debezium Oracle connector.

options.content:
# Debezium Oracle Connector Metrics

The Debezium Oracle connector has three metric types:

* snapshot metrics

* streaming metrics

* schema history metrics

For more detailed information about the metrics please visit the Debezium documentation page

[Click here to visit](https://debezium.io/documentation/reference/stable/connectors/oracle.html#oracle-monitoring)

# Schema Changes Metrics

For detailed explanation for all the schema changes metrics: [Visit Debezium documentation](https://debezium.io/documentation/reference/stable/connectors/oracle.html#oracle-schema-history-metrics)

title: Debezium Oracle Connector
